    • Uses of ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver in com.sri.ai.grinder.api

      Methods in com.sri.ai.grinder.api that return ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver.clone() 
      ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver Theory.getSingleQuantifierEliminatorStepSolver(SingleQuantifierEliminationProblem problem, Context context)
      Provides a quantifier eliminator step solver for use with given single-variable constraint and body, or null if there is no appropriate theory.
      ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver Theory.getSingleVariableConstraintModelCountingStepSolver(SingleVariableConstraint constraint, Context context)
      Given a single-variable constraint in this theory, returns a ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver computing its model count.
      ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver Theory.getSingleVariableConstraintSatisfiabilityStepSolver(SingleVariableConstraint constraint, Context context)
      Given a single-variable constraint in this theory, returns a ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver deciding its satisfiability.
      ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver.Step.getStepSolverForWhenSplitterIsFalse()
      Same as ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver.Step.getStepSolverForWhenSplitterIsTrue() but for when literal is false.
      ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver.ItDependsOn.getStepSolverForWhenSplitterIsFalse() 
      ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver.Solution.getStepSolverForWhenSplitterIsFalse() 
      ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver.Step.getStepSolverForWhenSplitterIsTrue()
      Returns a ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver to be used for finding the final solution in case the literal is defined as true by the context.
      ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver.ItDependsOn.getStepSolverForWhenSplitterIsTrue() 
      ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver.Solution.getStepSolverForWhenSplitterIsTrue() 
      ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver Theory.makeEvaluatorStepSolver(Expression expression)
      Provides an evaluator step solver that must be based on a recursive exhaustive application of Theory.getTopRewriter() and also externalize literals (this ensures completeness in the sense that, if the resulting value is the same under all contexts, which will be detected and that single value will be returned, because if then Value else if then Value else Value gets simplified to Value).
      Constructors in com.sri.ai.grinder.api with parameters of type ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver 
      Constructor and Description
      ItDependsOn(Expression literal, ContextSplitting contextSplitting, ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver stepSolverIfExpressionIsTrue, ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver stepSolverIfExpressionIsFalse) 
      ItDependsOn(ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver.Step itDependsOn, ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver stepSolverIfExpressionIsTrue, ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver stepSolverIfExpressionIsFalse)
      Alternative constructor re-using splitter and context splitting from another ExpressionLiteralSplitterStepSolver.ItDependsOn step.
